Class Movers

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Overworld
          Movers

public class Movers
extends Overworld

The Mover class, to both organise movers in the GameWorld, as well as provide some common variables between all movers.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Matthew Hillier
